title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 6.10 - Cash discounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 6.10 - Cash discounts

State Regulations

It is the policy of the State to take cash discounts for
which the State is eligible. The agency shall identify any discounts available
and the conditions and restrictions applicable thereto and establish the extent
to which the State qualifies for such discounts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
6.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
